results.title: Avocado Pesto Tuna Salad with Sun-Dried Tomatoes

steps.step: Add all of the ingredients for the avocado pesto to a food processor. Pulse until completely smooth. Taste for flavor and add more salt to taste.
Add the tuna, red onion, and sun-dried tomatoes to a mixing bowl.
Mix in the avocado pesto and stir until well-combined.
Spread tuna salad on toasted bread to make a sandwich or add to your favorite green salad.

ingredients.name: parsley leaves

ingredients.name: red onion
ingredients.original: ¼ cup red onion, finely chopped

ingredients.name: sun-dried tomatoes

results.title: Spinach Salad With Salmon, Barley, And Oranges
Spinach Salad With Salmon, Barley, And Oranges
High-Protein Black Bean Avocado Tuna Salad Sandwiches

steps.step: In a large bowl, mash avocado. Fold in tuna then add in the following: cilantro, tomato halves, lime/lemon juice, salt and pepper.
Mix to combine.Toast bread and spoon tuna salad on top.
Garnish with extra cilantro and goat cheese. Enjoy! Makes 2 open faced sandwiches.

results.title: Sunday Brunch: Cobb Salad

steps.step: Whisk together sherry vinegar, olive oil, and shallot.  Season to taste with salt and pepper.
Season chicken breast with salt and pepper.

Heat a skillet over medium high heat and drizzle with olive oil.  Once the oil is shimmering add the chicken breasts and cook until outside is golden brown, and internal temperature is 160[°], abut 8 minutes.
Remove from pan and once cool enough to handle slice into cubes.
Dress Bibb lettuce leaves with dressing and divide between 4 bowls.  Working around each bowl arrange cooked chicken, tomatoes, crumbled blue cheese, chopped bacon, and avocado on top of lettuce.
Place quartered egg in center of each salad and drizzle extra dressing over each one.
Serve with crusty bread and chilled beer.

ingredients.name: kosher salt
ingredients.original: Kosher salt and cracked black pepper
ingredients.originalString: Kosher salt and cracked black pepper
ingredients.originalName: Kosher salt and cracked black pepper

Remove from pan and once cool enough to handle slice into cubes.
Dress Bibb lettuce leaves with dressing and divide between 4 bowls.  Working around each bowl arrange cooked chicken, tomatoes, crumbled blue cheese, chopped bacon, and avocado on top of lettuce.

results.title: Pan fried halibut with kiwi berry salsa

steps.step: Season both filets with salt & pepper.

Place flour in a small, shallow dish.Coat each fillet in flour on all sides, set aside.Bring a medium skillet to med-high heat with olive oil in it.Once hot, place halibut in pan and "fry" on each side for 2-3 minutes until cooked through.
Combine kiwis, avocado, red onion and cilantro in a small bowl.
Whisk together lime juice, honey, salt & pepper in another small bowl and pour over salsa.Toss gently to combine.Top cooked fish with salsa and serve immediately.

ingredients.name: kiwi
ingredients.original: 6 oz. kiwi berries, sliced in half
ingredients.originalString: 6 oz. kiwi berries, sliced in half

ingredients.original: 6 oz. kiwi berries, sliced in half

Combine kiwis, avocado, red onion and cilantro in a small bowl.
Whisk together lime juice, honey, salt & pepper in another small bowl and pour over salsa.Toss gently to combine.Top cooked fish with salsa and serve immediately.

results.title: Grilled Salmon And Bok Choy With Orange-avocado Salsa
Grilled Salmon And Bok Choy With Orange-avocado Salsa
Tuna, Avocado and Feta Salad with Lemon

ingredients.name: solid white albacore tuna in olive oil

steps.step: Arrange 2 cups of baby spinach on each of two plates or in two containers (for taking for lunch). Arrange half of the red pepper on each in a row. Repeat this with the avocado, feta and tuna. Squeeze half the lemon onto each salad, taking care to drench the avocado. This will prevent it from browning if you aren't digging in right away.
Drizzle with olive oil, to taste, and sprinkle with salt and pepper.Enjoy immediately, or cover and enjoy within 4-5 hours.

ingredients.name: solid white albacore tuna in olive oil

results.title: Crab & avocado tostadas

steps.step: Put the onion in a bowl and cover with half the lime juice and a good pinch each of sugar and salt. Leave to soften while you get everything else ready.

Mix together the crabmeat, spring onions and half the chilli. Season with black pepper and set aside. Mash the avocado with the remaining lime juice, garlic and some seasoning. You can leave it quite chunky or mash it until smooth. Stir in the rest of the chilli.
Bend each tortilla in half and toast in a toaster for 1 min. Put on 2 plates and top with the salad leaves, then mashed avocado. Finish with the crabmeat and drained pickled onion.
Serve with lime wedges for squeezing over.

ingredients.original: 1 small red onion, sliced into thin rings
ingredients.originalString: 1 small red onion, sliced into thin rings
ingredients.originalName: red onion, sliced into thin rings

ingredients.original: juice 2 limes, plus wedges to serve
ingredients.originalString: juice 2 limes, plus wedges to serve
ingredients.originalName: juice limes, plus wedges to serve

ingredients.original: 170g can white crabmeat in brine, drained
